description:
The villainous Yukino, true to her word, destroys Kanmuri’s lab after he loses to Kazuma. Meanwhile, the match between Suwabara and Kawachi is about to begin!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: What the-!? Kawachi`s Intensive Manliness Training!
อะไรนะ! คาวาจิฝึกพิเศษแบบลูกผู้ชาย!
なんやてッ!! 河内, 漢の猛特訓!
